Reference: Math is Fun, Perimeter of an ellipse: 
https://www.mathsisfun.com/geometry/ellipse-perimeter.html <br/>
I used Ramanjan's first approximation:
$$ p \approx \pi \biggl[3(a+b)- \sqrt{(3a+b)(a+3b)} \biggl] $$
